meta.description: Optimize weekly meal prep to meet dietary needs at the lowest cost.

sets.name: FOODS
sets.description: Available food items for meal prep.

params.name: protein
params.description: Protein content of each food item in grams.

params.name: carbs
params.description: Carbohydrate content of each food item in grams.

params.name: calories
params.description: Caloric content of each food item.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of servings of each food item to purchase.

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(cost[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
objective.description: Minimize the total cost of food items to meet nutritional needs.

constraints.name: protein_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(protein[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
constraints.description: Ensure at least 59 grams of protein are consumed.

constraints.name: carbs_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(carbs[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
constraints.description: Ensure at least 179 grams of carbohydrates are consumed.

constraints.name: calories_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(calories[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
constraints.description: Ensure at least 2,414 calories are consumed.
